de.tobiasroeser.lambdatest

Interface LambdaTest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FreeSpec, FreeSpec, FreeSpecBase

    public interface LambdaTest

    Common interface shared between all supported test suites.

    See Also:
    FreeSpec, FreeSpec

    • Method Detail

      • pending

        void pending()

        Marks the test as pending. Instructions after pending() will not be executed.

      • pending

        void pending(String reason)

        Marks the test as pending and uses the given reason as message. Instructions after pending() will not be executed.

      • intercept

        <T extends Throwable> T intercept(Class<T> exceptionType,
                                  RunnableWithException throwing)
                           throws Exception

        Intercept exceptions of type exceptionType and fail if no such exception or an exception with an incompatible type was thrown.

        Parameters:
        exceptionType - The exception type to intercept.
        throwing - The execution block which is expected to throw the exception.
        Returns:
        The intercepted exception.
        Throws:
        Exception - If no exception was thrown or an exception with an incompatible type was thrown.

      • intercept

        <T extends Throwable> T intercept(Class<T> exceptionType,
                                  String messageRegex,
                                  RunnableWithException throwing)
                           throws Exception

        Intercept exceptions of type exceptionType and fail if no such exception or an exception with an incompatible type was thrown or it the message does not match a given pattern.

        Parameters:
        exceptionType - The exception type to intercept.
        messageRegex - A regular expression pattern to match the expected message. See Pattern for details.
        throwing - The execution block which is expected to throw the exception.
        Returns:
        The intercepted exception.
        Throws:
        Exception - If no exception was thrown or an exception with an incompatible type was thrown or if the message of the exception did not match the expected pattern.

      • setRunInParallel

        void setRunInParallel(boolean runInParallel)

        If true tests in this suite can be run in parallel.

        Parameters:
        runInParallel - If true, tests may execute in parallel.

      • setExpectFailFast

        void setExpectFailFast(boolean failFast)

        If true, the first failed assertion will also fail the test. If false, the test runs as long as possible, potentially collection multipe failed assertions.

        Parameters:
        failFast - If true, to fail fast.

      • setReporter

        void setReporter(Reporter reporter)

        Set the Reporter to be used.

        Parameters:
        reporter - The Reporter to be used.

      • getReporter

        Reporter getReporter()

        Gets the currently used reporter.
